name: [Manor]
uniques: Removes removable features when built
Cannot be built on [Land] tiles <within [1] tiles of a [City center]>
[-99 Gold, -99 Production, -99 Food, -99 Science, -99 Culture, -99 Happiness, -99 Faith]<within [1] tiles of a [City center]> <hidden from users>
Cannot be built on [Land] tiles <within [2] tiles of a [[Manor]]>
[-99 Gold, -99 Production, -99 Food, -99 Science, -99 Culture, -99 Happiness, -99 Faith]<within [2] tiles of a [[Manor]]> <hidden from users>
Comment [投机取巧将[Manor]设置在禁用范围内将导致地块没有产出]
Adjacent enemy units ending their turn take [5] damage
Tile provides yield without assigned population
Comment [移除地形带来的产出，包括建造[Petra]带来的收益]
[+1 Gold] <for every adjacent [Bonus resource]>
[+1 Gold] <for every adjacent [Luxury resource]>
[-1 Production, -1 Food] from [Plains] tiles <in tiles without [Hill]> <hidden from users>
[-2 Food] from [Grassland] tiles <in tiles without [Hill]> <hidden from users>
[-2 Production] from [Hill] tiles <hidden from users>
[-2 Food] from [Flood plains] tiles <hidden from users>
[-1 Food] from [Tundra] tiles <hidden from users>
[-1 Production, -1 Food, -1 Gold] from [Desert] tiles <in cities with a [Petra]> <hidden from users>
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+20 Gold]

name: [Moai]
uniques: [+1 Culture] <after discovering [Construction]> <in tiles adjacent to [Moai] tiles>
[+1 Culture] <after discovering [Construction]> <in tiles adjacent to [Coast] tiles>
[+1 Gold] <after discovering [Flight]>
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+10 Gold]

name: [Terrace farm]
uniques: [+1 Food] for each adjacent [Mountain]
[+1 Food] from [Fresh water] tiles <after discovering [Civil Service]>
[+1 Food] from [non-fresh water] tiles <after discovering [Fertilizer]>
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+18 Gold]

name: [Polder]
uniques: [+1 Production, +2 Gold] <after discovering [Currency]>
Pillaging this improvement yields approximately [+18 Gold]
Cannot be built on [Grassland] tiles
[+1 Food] from [Marsh] tiles
[+1 Food] from [Flood plains] tiles
